summary: Fixed Prisma client cache issue - cleared .next cache and node_modules/.prisma, regenerated Prisma client, and restarted server. The category column exists in the database, but the cached Prisma client was using old schema. Server restarted to pick up new Prisma client.
current_status: Prisma client regenerated, cache cleared, server restarting. The category column exists in database - issue was Prisma client cache.
